channel.title: Edgar Wright - How to Do Visual Comedy
channel.description:
https://youtu.be/3FOzD4Sfgag
From [Edgar Wright - How to Do Visual Comedy - YouTube](https://youtu.be/3FOzD4Sfgag):
Consider how artforms and disciplines tend to calcify, and what our role is in counter-acting that.
Warning, this could ruin comedy movies for you forever.
